title: How to win games ? (Ranked/Normals)
body:
Just be a brainless zombie and follow the meta like a sheep . Don't you even dare to play your favorite champions that are off meta . Just be a fucking zombie , play Lee Sin/Vi/Heca if you're going Jungle , play Twitch/Cait/Jhin/Jinx if you're going ADC . Play Syndra if you're going mid . 

Thank you for your attention , and especially , thank you for the " diversity " Riot . You're awesome !

replies.body: what about if you enjoy those champs?{{item:3157}}

> [{quoted}](name=Silencega,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAkiiRuW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-22T00:22:12.022+0000)
>
> what about if you enjoy those champs?{{item:3157}}

Then dont be surprised if someone calls you a fucking metaslave .

EDIT : Completely different word
